      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cdd3fc-1c98-41c7-2b91-3604754eaddc#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az Apáca utcai emlékek</string>
            <string language="en">memories from Nun street (Apáca utca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicher von der Nonne Straße (Apáca utca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mémoires de rue de nonne (utca d'Apáca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">memórias da rua do nun (utca de Apáca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">memorie dalla via del nun (utca di Apáca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μνήμες από την οδό καλογριών (utca Apαca)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">memorias de la calle de la monja (utca de Apáca)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Apáca utca ókeresztény emlékei</string>
            <string language="en">paleochristian memories from Nun street (Apáca utca)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókeresztény művészet,  temetkezés,  sírkamrák,  Kr.u. 1-4. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">paleochristian art, making graves, burial vaults, 1st-4th century A.D. funeral</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">paleochristian Speicher von der Nonne Straße 
(Apáca utca)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mémoires paleochristian de rue de nonne (utca 
d'Apáca)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">memórias paleochristian da rua do nun (utca de 
Apáca)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">memorie paleochristian dalla via del nun (utca di 
Apáca)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">paleochristian μνήμες από την οδό καλογριών 
(utca Apαca)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">memorias paleochristian de la calle de la monja 
(utca de Apáca)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die paleochristian kunst, Gräber, Beerdigung bildend 
vaults, 1.-. Begräbnis des Jahrhunderts A.D.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art paleochristian, faisant des tombes, chambres fortes
d'enterrement, 1er-4ème enterrement du siècle A.D.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a arte paleochristian, fazendo sepulturas, enterro 
vaults, 1o-ô funeral do século A.D.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte paleochristian, facente le tombe, volte di 
sepoltura, primo-quarto funerale di secolo A.D.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">paleochristian τέχνη, που κάνει τους τάφους, υπόγειοι 
θάλαμοι ενταφιασμών, κηδεία του 1$ος-4$ου αιώνα Μ.Χ.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte paleochristian, haciendo los sepulcros, cámaras 
acorazadas del entierro, 1ro-ô entierro del siglo A.D.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
